title: CONTROL TEAM - CHECKS REVIEW AND VALIDATION - GO/NO GO

task_list.instruction_title:
Controls Team to  review the results of the control together with IT and Business.
Once done then confirm the go ahead for the Migration together with SG PBS project Mgmt team.

C1001_1 - File volume check before SECLI engine integration

C1019_1- Breakdown count of lines per received files **C1005A - List of duplicate keys in SG files
